caption: A girl was having an intense conversation with someone who was supposed to take their photo. Many people were working on computers. Inside an airport, the girl and an elderly man were surrounded by a crowd of photographers, and people held up banners to welcome them. On an airplane, a flight attendant handed a magazine to the girl. A woman sat at her office desk, and someone delivered a large portrait to her. Inside an airport, a gigantic creature was walking around. A person was driving a car on the road. A man in a lab coat entered a building and dropped something down the stairs. A huge creature approached. A group of people watched surveillance footage on a computer screen and chatted non-stop.

global.question: When does the things in the video happens, ancient age, modern age or future?(Does the technology exists on earth?)
Are there more then five different places appear in the video(scene switch doesn't necessarily means a place change)?
Is there more than three different characters appear(not including people in the background)?
what time does the video take place?(at day time or night time?)
Where does the video take place? Indoors or outdoors?

breakpoint.question: Is it at day time or night time?
Is it at day time or night time?
what's abnormal about the man?
breakpoint.answer: He can't keep himself in balance. He seems to be drunk.

breakpoint.question: what's the gender of the person in the middle of the scene?
